result.title: Weapon Plus
result.description:
"Weapon Plus." is the first, but a large and high-quality pack of mods that adds working weapons to the game. 

The pack includes:
• 6 unique weapons. 
• 3 Rifles. 
• 3 Shotguns. 
• 4 pistols. 
• 9 electric guns. 
• 6 Turrets. 
• 1 Automatic. 
• 5 PP. 
• 2 secret guns. 
• 2 wrist blasters. 
• 1 item with the authors of the pack. 


Total: 42 weapons. 
Each weapon is unique and fits the style of the game. 
( the soundtrack is also available. )

result.title: Hotline Miami Weapon Pack
result.description:
The mod adds quite a few edged weapons from the game Hotline Miami to the game.

To play comfortably, you need to disable collision at the item, attach a knife to it and enjoy Hotline Miami.

result.title: Ice Cannons
result.description:
Ice cannons

1. Ice cannon 00 (large)
2. Ice cannon 01 (smaller)
3. The projectile

• Shoot by pressing the lever
• 00 has a grenade launcher and a thermal imager (for oriented in the dark)
• Shoot mini staffs
• Really freeze
• Huge radius of destruction
• Additional damage (tearing of the torso' hands)
• Heavy, difficult to give melon
